SEARCH

所有类和接口

类
说明
BottomBarPanel
Slim footer bar for the Shapeville window.
CenterPanelContainer
Vertical container placed at the centre of the Shapeville main window.
ColorManager
Centralises every colour constant used by Shapeville.
ColorRefreshable
Color Refresh interface - All Windows or components that need to respond to changes in color blindness modes must implement this interface
MainWindow
Entry point for the Shapeville desktop game.
ShapevilleGUI
Main GUI frame for the Shapeville educational game application.
ShapevilleMainContent
Central dashboard shown at the top of the centre column.
StageSwitcherPanel
Two-stage navigator embedded below the main dashboard.
Task1Screen
Interactive window for Task 1 – Shape Recognition.
Task2Screen
Interactive window for Task 2 – Angle Type Identification.
Task3Screen
Interactive window for Task 3 – Shape Area Calculation.
Task4Screen
Circle-practice window used by Shapeville's geometry course.
Task5Screen
Practice window for estimating the area of irregular / compound shapes.
Task6Screen
Interactive window for practising the area of circular sectors.
TaskCard
Reusable card component shown in the Stage-Switcher grid.
TopNavBarPanel
Slim, gradient-friendly navigation bar reused at the top of every Shapeville window.
